title: Sync alpha release issue to Beads
description:
## Context

This tracks syncing the Alpha Release meta issue from GitHub to Beads.

**GitHub Issue**: https://github.com/Open-Harness/open-harness/issues/72
- Title: ðŸš€ Alpha Release Preparation (Meta Issue)
- Contains 15+ sub-issues for alpha prep work

## Migration Plan

We're transitioning issue tracking:
- **FROM**: GitHub Issues (manual, web UI dependent)
- **TO**: Beads + Linear (AI-native, CLI-first)

### Why
- Beads works natively with AI agents (no API keys, no context switching)
- Linear provides a nice web UI for humans who need it
- GitHub Issues will be deprecated for new work

### Next Steps
1. Set up Linear integration (`bd linear sync`)
2. Import existing alpha-prep issues from GitHub â†’ Beads
3. Stop creating new GitHub issues
4. Use Beads for all agent work, Linear for human visibility
